answers.author: Leslie Beauregard
answers.text:
Paul:  Here in Charlottesville the control resides in Budget first - we check the funding, compare against the budget approved FTE's for the year, etc.  Then it goes to HR for the next level of approval.  But, the process begins in the Budget Office.
